messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Quartermassster isss in charge whilssst im on my adventuresss in the cosssmosss if i am needed i will apear

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Just because the Captain says the QM is in charge, shaky legality of that aside, doesn't mean Security stops existing. Do your job and try not to wreck your workplace, nothing changes.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Fuck the SoP, this is an executive order

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: In all seriousness, the captain is still alive and i don't have a clue what i'm doing, HoS is in charge

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Acting Captain here. Am I right to assume that station productivity is nearing 0%, or are some of you still doing your jobs?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Dormitories is full of hull breaches and holo carp. Avoid it. If we have engineers, please try to fix it.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Attention all crew the ssstation isss sssignificantly fucked and we need to get out of dodje i am trying to be calm about thisss ssshit ssso jussst get to the fuckin ssshuttle and letsss have thisss  ssshit ssshow over with ok?
